messages.subject: Re: awful books
messages.msgSnippet: ********I ve started many novels only to decide a short way into them that they re not (to me) worth finishing.  Should I force myself to read the entire book
messages.messageBody:
********I've started many novels only to decide a short way into them that they're not (to me) worth finishing. Should I force myself to read the entire book so that I can judge it fairly as a whole? Mabye that would be really nice of me, but I have better things to do with my time. ********

I must have some funky sickness <BWG> cuz I do finish awful books and movies... I don't know if it's a hope that things will get better, or if it means I'm too darned nosy to just leave it alone - I just gotta know exactly how awful it is... LOL



---------------------------------
